actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 319 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to waive the requirements of prior residence or physical presence in the United States in the naturalization proceedings for any person who is the surviving natural or adoptive parent of a person who dies during a period of honorable active duty service in the United States Armed Forces during the war in Vietnam or subsequent hostilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 319 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
